MiscMetabar 0.22
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Blast some sequence against refseq slot of a phyloseq-class object.

Source: R/dada_phyloseq.R
blast_to_phyloseq.Rd

blast_to_phyloseq(
  physeq,
  seq2search,
  blastpath = NULL,
  id_cut = 90,
  bit_score_cut = 1e-10,
  unique_per_seq = FALSE,
  score_filter = TRUE,
  list_no_output_query = FALSE
)

Arguments

physeq

(required): a phyloseq-class object.

seq2search

(required): path to fasta file

blastpath

(default = NULL): path to blast program

id_cut

(default = 90): cut of in identity percent to keep result

bit_score_cut

(default = 1e-10): cut of in bit score to keep result

unique_per_seq

(default = FALSE) : only return the first match for each sequence in seq2search

score_filter

(default = TRUE): does results are filter by score. If FALSE, id_cut and bit_score_cut are ignored

list_no_output_query

(default to FALSE): does the result table include query sequences for which blastn does not find any correspondence

Value

the blast table

Examples

if (FALSE) {
data(data_fungi)
blastpath <- "...YOUR_PATH_TO_BLAST..."
blast_to_phyloseq(data_fungi,
  seq2search = "inst/extdata/ex.fasta",
  blastpath = blastpath
)
}
